statements: DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light');
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com');
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM users WHERE user_id = 101);
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile');
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 1001 AND user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01');
DELETE FROM device_functions WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'));
